meanings.definition: Designed to withstand exposure to the weather.
meanings.sent1: The weatherproof jacket kept me dry during the rainstorm.
meanings.sent2: It's important to have weatherproof clothing for outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The weatherproof umbrella saved the day when unexpected rain poured down.
meanings.sent4: Her weatherproof sunscreen protected her skin from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The weatherproof sealant prevented any leaks in the roof.

meanings.definition: To make something resistant to damage from the weather.
meanings.sent1: I need to weatherproof the windows before the storm hits.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter weatherproofed the outdoor furniture to prevent rot.
meanings.sent3: He decided to weatherproof his phone case to keep it safe from rain.
meanings.sent4: The gardener weatherproofed the plants against frost by covering them.
meanings.sent5: She carefully weatherproofed the picnic basket to protect the food from rain.
